text:
When I'm compiling php-4.3.9 as a DSO on HP-UX 11, I get the following error
(when trying to install it):

Installing PHP SAPI module:       apache
apxs:Error: file libs/libphp4.sl is not a DSO
make: *** [install-sapi] Error 1
creator: olivier.mehani@linbox.com

text:
Created attachment 13709
Patch to apxs.pl to handle .sl DSO files on hpux

apxs(.pl) doesn't know about HP-UX's .sl files being Dynamic Shared Objects. We
let it know...
creator: olivier.mehani@linbox.com
